entities.name: eeylops owl emporium
entities.description: A store that sells owls and other magical creatures.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story.

entities.name: eylops owl emporium
entities.description: A store that sells owls and other magical creatures.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: The gamekeeper at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: professor quirrell
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

relationships.description: Harry and Hagrid visited Eeylops Owl Emporium.
After visiting Eeylops, Harry and Hagrid went to Ollivanders.
Hagrid mentioned the Dursleys in conversation with Harry.
Harry was compared to Professor Quirrell by Hagrid.
After visiting Ollivanders, Harry purchased a wand from the store.
Hagrid recommended that Harry buy his wand at Ollivanders.
